animeDescription: In a near future, an illness called "Cagaster" made ​​its appearance. It turns humans into insects. The story begins 30 years after the onset of the illness, in 2125. It follows the adventures of Kidou, a boy who fights insects.(Source: MAL News)
animeVoices: ['Hosoya, Yoshimasa', 'Hanae, Natsuki', 'Hanazawa, Kana', 'Morikawa, Toshiyuki', 'Namikawa, Daisuke', 'Kayano, Ai', 'Mamiya, Yasuhiro', 'Kitou, Akari']
